raw_input: We need a web application that allows users to register, login, and manage their profiles. The system should be secure, fast, and user-friendly.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must allow users to register.
parsed_requirements.source: We need a web application that allows users to register, login, and manage their profiles.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must allow users to login.
parsed_requirements.source: We need a web application that allows users to register, login, and manage their profiles.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must allow users to manage their profiles.
parsed_requirements.source: We need a web application that allows users to register, login, and manage their profiles.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must be secure.
parsed_requirements.source: The system should be secure, fast, and user-friendly.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must be fast.
parsed_requirements.source: The system should be secure, fast, and user-friendly.

parsed_requirements.description: The web application must be user-friendly.
parsed_requirements.source: The system should be secure, fast, and user-friendly.

metadata.processing_notes: All requirements were clearly defined and extracted from the input.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must allow users to register.

decomposed_requirements.description: Users must be able to enter their personal information for registration.
acceptance_criteria: User can input name, email, and password.
User receives a confirmation email after registration.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must allow users to login.

decomposed_requirements.description: Users must be able to enter their credentials to log in.
acceptance_criteria: User can input email and password.
User receives an error message for incorrect credentials.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must allow users to manage their profiles.

decomposed_requirements.description: Users must be able to update their personal information.
acceptance_criteria: User can change their name, email, and password.
Changes are saved and reflected in the user profile.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must be secure.

decomposed_requirements.description: The application must use HTTPS for all communications.
acceptance_criteria: All data transmitted must be encrypted.
Users must be notified of security measures.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must be fast.

decomposed_requirements.description: The application must load within 2 seconds.
acceptance_criteria: Page load times are measured and reported.
Performance optimization techniques are implemented.

analyzed_requirements.original_requirement: The web application must be user-friendly.

decomposed_requirements.description: The application must have an intuitive navigation system.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily find key features.
User feedback is collected to improve usability.

suggested_improvements: Define what personal information is required for registration.
Specify what credentials are required for login.
Clarify what personal information can be updated.

clarification_questions.question: What specific security measures are required beyond HTTPS?
clarification_questions.context: To ensure comprehensive security for the application.

suggested_improvements: Define what 'secure' means in the context of the application.

clarification_questions.question: What specific performance metrics define 'fast' for the application?
clarification_questions.context: To ensure that performance expectations are clear.

suggested_improvements: Define what 'fast' means in terms of user experience.

clarification_questions.question: What specific features or design elements make the application 'user-friendly'?
clarification_questions.context: To ensure that user experience expectations are clear.

suggested_improvements: Define what 'user-friendly' means in the context of the application.

concerns: What information is required for registration?
Is there a verification process after registration?
questions: Will users be able to register using social media accounts?
What happens if a user forgets their registration details?
suggestions: Include a confirmation email after registration.
Provide a clear error message for failed registrations.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The requirement lacks details on the registration process.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Improved user onboarding can increase user retention.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: The registration process is feasible with current technology.

concerns: What authentication methods will be supported?
Is there a password recovery option?
questions: Will there be a limit on login attempts?
How will user sessions be managed?
suggestions: Implement multi-factor authentication for enhanced security.
Provide a 'Remember Me' option for convenience.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The requirement needs clarification on security measures.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Secure login can enhance user trust.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: Implementing various authentication methods is feasible.

concerns: What specific profile management features will be available?
questions: Will users be able to change their usernames?
How will privacy settings be managed?
suggestions: Include options for users to manage privacy settings.
Allow users to view their activity history.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The requirement is too vague regarding profile management.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Enhanced profile management can improve user engagement.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: Profile management features are technically feasible.

concerns: What specific security measures will be implemented?
How will compliance with regulations be ensured?
questions: Is there a plan for regular security audits?
What happens in case of a data breach?
suggestions: Define security protocols and standards to be followed.
Include a response plan for security incidents.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The term 'secure' is too ambiguous without specific measures.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Clear security measures can protect company reputation.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: Implementing security measures is feasible but requires planning.

questions: Is there a target load time for the application?
What are the expected user loads?
suggestions: Specify performance benchmarks for the application.
Consider using caching mechanisms to improve speed.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The requirement lacks measurable criteria for performance.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Defining performance can lead to better user satisfaction.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: Performance improvements are achievable with proper architecture.

concerns: What does 'user-friendly' mean in this context?
questions: Are there specific user personas to consider?
What accessibility standards will be followed?
suggestions: Define usability metrics and testing methods.
Include user testing phases in the development process.
stakeholder_feedback.rationale: The term 'user-friendly' is subjective and needs clarification.
stakeholder_feedback.business_impact: Improving usability can lead to higher user satisfaction.
stakeholder_feedback.technical_feasibility: Usability testing can be integrated into the development cycle.

conflict_analysis.conflict_description: The business stakeholder wants clear security measures, while the technical stakeholder is focused on performance metrics.
conflict_analysis.proposed_resolution: Define specific security measures that do not compromise performance benchmarks.
conflict_analysis.impact_assessment: Failure to resolve this conflict may lead to either inadequate security or poor performance.

risks: Potential for user data privacy issues
validation_results.validation_notes: Clarify required information for registration and verification process.
validation_results.timeline_impact: Moderate impact due to potential changes in requirements.

risks: Password recovery process may complicate implementation
validation_results.validation_notes: Define authentication methods and password recovery options.
validation_results.timeline_impact: Moderate impact due to dependencies on registration.

risks: Lack of clarity on profile management features
Potential complexity in allowing profile picture uploads
validation_results.validation_notes: Specify profile management features and upload capabilities.
validation_results.timeline_impact: Moderate impact due to dependencies on login and registration.

risks: Unclear security measures may lead to vulnerabilities
Compliance with regulations may require additional resources
validation_results.validation_notes: Detail specific security measures and compliance strategies.
validation_results.timeline_impact: High impact due to complexity of security implementation.

risks: Ambiguity in defining 'fast' may lead to misalignment with user expectations
Performance measurement may require additional tools
validation_results.validation_notes: Clarify metrics for performance and measurement methods.
validation_results.timeline_impact: Moderate impact due to potential need for performance testing.

risks: Vague definition of 'user-friendly' may lead to inconsistent implementation
Usability testing may require user feedback and iterations
validation_results.validation_notes: Define 'user-friendly' and outline usability testing methods.
validation_results.timeline_impact: Moderate impact due to potential iterations based on user feedback.

critical_issues: Unclear requirements leading to potential implementation risks
Need for detailed specifications in multiple areas
recommendations: Conduct workshops to define specific features and metrics
Allocate resources for security and usability testing

documentation.executive_summary: This document outlines the requirements for a web application that enables users to register, login, and manage their profiles. The application is designed to be secure, fast, and user-friendly, ensuring a positive user experience while maintaining high standards of security and performance.

functional_requirements.description: The web application must allow users to register.
The web application must allow users to login.
The web application must allow users to manage their profiles.

non_functional_requirements.description: The web application must be secure.
The web application must be fast.
The web application must be user-friendly.

glossary.RequirementType: Categorization of requirements into functional and non-functional.
glossary.Priority: Indicates the importance of the requirement (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW).

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Enable user registration to enhance user base.
acceptance_criteria: User can register successfully
Validation messages are displayed for invalid inputs

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Allow users to access their accounts securely.
acceptance_criteria: User can login with valid credentials
Error message for invalid credentials

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Empower users to manage their profiles effectively.
acceptance_criteria: User can update profile information
Changes are saved successfully

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Ensure user data is protected against unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Data encryption is implemented
Access controls are in place

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Provide a responsive and fast user experience.
acceptance_criteria: Page load time is under 2 seconds

traceability_matrix.business_objective: Enhance user satisfaction through intuitive design.
acceptance_criteria: User feedback indicates ease of use

req-001: Validation messages are displayed for invalid inputs
req-002: User can login with valid credentials
req-005: Page load time is under 2 seconds
req-006: User feedback indicates ease of use

risk_assessment: Risk of data breaches due to inadequate security measures
Risk of poor user adoption if the application is not user-friendly
Risk of performance issues if the application is not optimized
